ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 10: The Lone & Level Sands
ComicInfo.Summary:
Gus Horncrasher is determined to find Owen at any cost, but first he has to go through Captain Jim. Back in Blackfossil, the Sheriff begins to unravel Nate’s secrets, Starlee prepares to leave town and Maribel’s first encounter with Tony is revealed, as the second volume of VORACIOUS concludes.
Featuring a “Dead Leaves” variant cover by VORACIOUS writer Markisan Naso! Limited to just 500 copies!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jason Muhr | 1 | Var | "Dead Leaves" Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Markisan Naso & Andrei Tăbăcaru | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 18:07:31. [CVDB591645]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrei Tăbăcaru, Jason Muhr, Markisan Naso
ComicInfo.Characters: Captain Jim, Gus Horncrasher, Maribel, Nate Willner, Starlee
